item.title: How to Renew Consul Root CA Certificate
item.description: The Consul root CA is generated using the consul tls ca create command. If created with the original options the root CA is only valid for a few years. After running production for a while you inevitably need to extend this certificate. To do so we need to generate and sign a new certificate using the existing private key. Consul does not provide any commands for doing so but it can be done using OpenSSL.
